Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at ACHAT Plaza Frankfurt/Offenbach in Offenbach, you'll be convenient to Wetterpark Offenbach and Isenburg Palace. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of German Leather Museum and Klingspor Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 155 guestrooms featuring minibars. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as a sauna and a fitness center. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at ACHAT Plaza Frankfurt/Offenbach in Offenbach, you'll be convenient to Wetterpark Offenbach and Isenburg Palace. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of German Leather Museum and Klingspor Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Wetterpark Offenbach - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Isenburg Palace - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
German Leather Museum - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Klingspor Museum - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Buesing Palais - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Stadtbibliothek Offenbach - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Haus der Stadtgeschichte - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Capitol - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Messe Offenbach - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Goethe Tower - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Dialog Museum - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Rumpenheim Palace - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Hessen Center - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Henninger Turm - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi
Frankfurt Zoological Garden - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi

The preferred airport for ACHAT Plaza Frankfurt/Offenbach is Frankfurt (FRA-Frankfurt Intl.) - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
